com.facebook.buck.parser

Class DaemonicParserState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.parser.DaemonicParserState

  • @ThreadSafe
public class DaemonicParserState
extends Object
    Persistent parsing data, that can exist between invocations of the Parser. All public methods that cause build files to be read must be guarded by calls to invalidateIfProjectBuildFileParserStateChanged(Cell) in order to ensure that state is maintained correctly.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrCreateNodeCache

        public <T> com.facebook.buck.parser.PipelineNodeCache.Cache<BuildTarget,T> getOrCreateNodeCache(Class<?> cacheType)
        Retrieve the cache view for caching a particular type.

        Note that the output type is not constrained to the type of the Class object to allow for types with generics. Care should be taken to ensure that the correct class object is passed in.

      • getRawNodeCache

      • invalidateBasedOnPath

        public void invalidateBasedOnPath(Path fullPath,
                                  boolean isCreatedOrDeleted)
        Invalidate the parser cache relative to the changes to file at the given path.
        Parameters:
        fullPath - Path to the file that changed.
        isCreatedOrDeleted - Indicates whether the file was created or deleted as opposed to being modified.
